Scripts.OnLoad: CHH_HintOptionSliderLoad( 'playerHitSoundDelay', 0, 61, 1, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS, CHHT_MISC_SECONDS_TITLE_FORMAT, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS );
CHH_HintOptionSliderLoad( 'announceHitToPartyDelay', 0, 61, 1, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS, CHHT_MISC_SECONDS_TITLE_FORMAT, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS );
CHH_HintOptionSliderLoad( 'announceOOMToPartyDelay', 0, 61, 1, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS, CHHT_MISC_SECONDS_TITLE_FORMAT, CHHT_LABEL_NEVER, CHHT_LABEL_ALWAYS );
